languages.text: "Мне искренне непонятна логика ваших действий, Ваша Светлость, но я хотя бы покидаю эту кучку неудачников. Хорошего вечера". {n}Поклонившись и нервно оправив костюм, мужчина направляется в замок.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: FW_HideAndSeek2_TrueVictim_Male_name, кланяется и в конце куя уходит к замку

traits.locale_text: "Мне искренне непонятна логика ваших действий, Ваша Светлость, но я хотя бы покидаю эту кучку неудачников. Хорошего вечера". {n}Поклонившись и нервно оправив костюм, мужчина направляется в замок.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: FW_HideAndSeek2_TrueVictim_Male_name, кланяется и в конце куя уходит к замку

languages.text: "I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your Celestial Highness, but at least I will no longer be forced to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мне искренне непонятна логика ваших действий, Ваша Светлость, но я хотя бы покидаю эту кучку неудачников. Хорошего вечера". {n}Поклонившись и нервно оправив костюм, мужчина направляется в замок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at least I no longer have to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves toward the castle.{/n}

"I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at least I no longer have to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves toward the castle.{/n}

"I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at least I no longer have to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}

"I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at least I no longer have to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}

"I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your Celestial Highness, but at least I will no longer be forced to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}

"I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your Celestial Highness, but at least I will no longer be forced to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}

languages.text: “我真的是完全被您的决定弄糊涂了，来自上界的大人。不过，至少我不用再忍受那些底层人了，祝您今晚玩得开心。”{n}那个人向你鞠了一躬，紧张地整理好了衣服，朝城堡的方向走远了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your Celestial Highness, but at least I will no longer be forced to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我真的是完全被您的决定弄糊涂了，来自上界的大人。不过，至少我不用再忍受那些底层人了，祝您今晚玩得开心。”{n}那个人向你鞠了一躬，紧张地整理好了衣服，朝城堡的方向走远了。{/n}

languages.text: «Su lógica me ha dejado anonadado, Excelencia Celestial, pero al menos ya no tendré que soportar a estos indeseables. Buenas noches a todos». {n}El hombre hace una reverencia, se ajusta la ropa nerviosamente y se marcha en dirección al castillo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your Celestial Highness, but at least I will no longer be forced to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Su lógica me ha dejado anonadado, Excelencia Celestial, pero al menos ya no tendré que soportar a estos indeseables. Buenas noches a todos». {n}El hombre hace una reverencia, se ajusta la ropa nerviosamente y se marcha en dirección al castillo.{/n}

languages.text: "Eylemlerinizin mantığı karşısında aklım fena hâlde karıştı Semavi Efendimiz ancak en azından artık bu aşağılıklara katlanmak zorunda kalmayacağım. İyi akşamlar dilerim." {n}Saygıyla eğilen adam, gergin bir şekilde üstünü başını düzeltip kaleye doğru yola koyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your Celestial Highness, but at least I will no longer be forced to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eylemlerinizin mantığı karşısında aklım fena hâlde karıştı Semavi Efendimiz ancak en azından artık bu aşağılıklara katlanmak zorunda kalmayacağım. İyi akşamlar dilerim." {n}Saygıyla eğilen adam, gergin bir şekilde üstünü başını düzeltip kaleye doğru yola koyuluyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「天の閣下、私はまったくあなたの行動の論理に混乱していますが、少なくともこのような低俗な生活を許容することをもはや強要されません。こんばんは」{n}男はお辞儀をして、緊張したように服を直し、城の方向に辞去する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your Celestial Highness, but at least I will no longer be forced to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「天の閣下、私はまったくあなたの行動の論理に混乱していますが、少なくともこのような低俗な生活を許容することをもはや強要されません。こんばんは」{n}男はお辞儀をして、緊張したように服を直し、城の方向に辞去する。{/n}

languages.text: « La logique de vos actions me laisse perplexe, Votre Altesse Célestissime, mais je ne serai pas mécontent de ne plus avoir à traiter avec ces rejets de l'Humanité. Bonne soirée à vous. » {n}L'homme s'incline, arrange nerveusement ses vêtements et s'éloigne en direction du château.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your Celestial Highness, but at least I will no longer be forced to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La logique de vos actions me laisse perplexe, Votre Altesse Célestissime, mais je ne serai pas mécontent de ne plus avoir à traiter avec ces rejets de l'Humanité. Bonne soirée à vous. » {n}L'homme s'incline, arrange nerveusement ses vêtements et s'éloigne en direction du château.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich begreife die Logik Eures Handelns nicht, Eure himmlische Hoheit, aber wenigstens bin ich nicht mehr gezwungen, diesen Pöbel zu dulden. Einen schönen Abend." {n}Der Mann verbeugt sich, richtet sich nervös die Kleidung und geht zur Burg.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am thoroughly perplexed by the logic of your actions, Your Celestial Highness, but at least I will no longer be forced to tolerate these lowlifes. Good evening to you." {n}The man bows, fixes his clothes nervously, and leaves in the direction of the castle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich begreife die Logik Eures Handelns nicht, Eure himmlische Hoheit, aber wenigstens bin ich nicht mehr gezwungen, diesen Pöbel zu dulden. Einen schönen Abend." {n}Der Mann verbeugt sich, richtet sich nervös die Kleidung und geht zur Burg.{/n}
